title: Raw Setup
info:
Raw server setup
- No pre-installed softwares
- No configurations
- Windows OS

title: MEAN Stack
info:
- MongoDB database

title: LAMP Stack
info:
- Linux operating system

- MySQL database

title: LEMP Stack
info:
- Linux operating system

- MySQL database

title: MERN Stack

title: MEVN Stack

title: Ruby on Rails
info: A Web-app framework that includes everything needed to create a database-backed Web application according to the Model-View-Controller (MVC) pattern.

title: Django
info: Djano is a full-stack python framework designed for Web applications. It is the Web framework for perfectionists with deadlines.

title: Joomla
info: Joomla is used to manage and create websites. It is great for beginners with little coding knowledge.

title: HumHub
info: HumHub is an social networking software that allows users to create their own social network.

title: Caddy
info: Caddy is designed to be easy to use and configure. It is known for its automatic HTTPS encryption, which makes it easy to secure websites without having to manually configure SSL certificates.

title: Ghost
info: Ghost is a modern publishing platform that is designed for bloggers and content creators. It is known for its simplicity and focus on the user experience.

title: Flask
info: Flask is a light framework for Pythonfor web applications. It a popular choice for developers who want to quickly create web applications.

title: Wordpress
info: Djano is a full-stack python framework designed for Web applications. It is the Web framework for perfectionists with deadlines.

title: Drupal
info: Drupal is a Others that is used for building complex websites and applications. It is known for its security and flexibility.

title: Round Cube
info: Roundcube is a free and open-source webmail software that allows users to access their email accounts through a web interface.

title: MariaDB
info: MariaDB is a fork of MySQL intended to remain free under the GNU GPL. It is notable for being led by the original developers of MySQL, who forked it due to concerns over its acquisition by Oracle.

title: MongoDB
info: MongoDB is a cross-platform document-oriented database program. Classified as a NoSQL database program, MongoDB uses JSON-like documents with schema.

title: Docker
info: Docker is a set of platform as a service products that use OS-level virtualization to deliver software in packages called containers.

title: Appwrite
info: Appwrite is a secure end-to-end backend server for Web, Mobile, and Flutter developers that is packaged as a set of Docker containers for easy deployment.
